meanings.definition: Continue firmly or obstinately in an opinion or a course of action in spite of difficulty, opposition, or failure.
meanings.sent1: She persists in her belief that hard work pays off.
meanings.sent2: He persists in asking questions until he understands.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel persists in trying to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His determination persists like a stubborn weed in a well-tended garden.
meanings.sent5: The image of her smiling face persists in his memory.

meanings.sent1: The smell of fresh cookies persists in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The feeling of excitement persists long after the event.
meanings.sent3: The rumor persists that aliens visit the town every night.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song persists in my mind like a catchy tune.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the sun persists on her skin even after sunset.
